#Text= Evacuee says : " Tell that mecha jerk to settle down .

column1: #Text=She 's the one blowing up the whole city !
#Text=" Train conductor says : " I hate to be the bearer of more bad news , but I just heard on the radio that Kuvira 's army has destroyed the train tracks .
#Text=We 're not getting out of the city by rail .
#Text=I was just up on the observation deck and saw a bunch of mecha suit soldiers heading this way !
#Text=We 're all gon na get blown to bits !
#Text=" Wu says : " Listen everyone , I can get us out of here if you just sit tight .
#Text=Can you step off the bench , please ?
#Text=No one needs me on the bench .
#Text=" Evacuee says : " Whoa , whoa , whoa , whoa .
#Text=" Wu says : " I 'm going to get some help .
#Text=You think you can handle this unruly mob for a little while ?
